input.sentences: the sky began to turn grey .
the waves made a big splash against the rocks .
it looked as though it was about to rain .
he walked on the beach after the water began to calm down .
output.sentences: We decided not to go by car and the interstate, but to take a train that would allow us to see the ocean up close.
It  was such a good choice, the waves and the rocks and the sky were all so beautiful!
A bird wheeling across the grey clouds, missing the  high, domed rocks and the peaking waves, was something to see.
The water rushed in and the rocks broke the waves into a million pieces of fluorescent and lace-like rivulets.
The sun was absolutely dazzling behind the dark clouds as night began to roll in.
